text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Can I ask you for one more reward…?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice, when I was little, I used to read picture books. When I read a certain picture book, I wanted to make my dream come true for the first time.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So, now it's Rice's turn. I want to write a picture book that delivers dreams to everyone.
The sky was really dark and rough. and the stormy days continued for a long time. A strong wind blew up as if the mountains were angry, “I'm shivering”.
“I want to change the scary weather that continues to be dark into a blue sky”.
When everyone was thinking so, the wizard showed up.
While the wizard is watched by everyone, she decides to use magic to resolve the issue.
Then, a gentle wind blew, and the sky was returned blue in the same moment.
The mountain became calm, and a beautiful wind that seemed to be transparent flowed to me.
Everyone was happy and welcomed the wizard.
“My power was meant for this moment”.
The wizard responded with a smile.
In this way, the wizard, under the big blue sky, stayed forever and forever….
